website_summaries.verdict: It is the most popular messenger bag on the market right now for a reason. It's construction quality rivals that of bags five times the price.
pros: Classic good looks made with genuine cowhide leather that will last
Quality leather zipper tassels and dense, soft leather construction give it years of dependable use
cons: The metal hooks have been known to wear out after years of use, but they are replaceable

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control issue with Flap closure
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the bag, just that I got a faulty flap closure. Very very disappointed with quality control !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dung Hoang

customer_reviews.title: This is a steal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the brown version as it was on sale for ~ $75.00. It is a steal at that price. Very sturdy, soft real leather. Nice pockets, easy access, and spacious. It has virtually everything I was looking for but in one bag. I have several, couldn’t find one that I liked. Too flimsy, too small, etc. This one hits the spot. Already received compliments too. I thought I would hate the brown, love it. It is a dark chocolate brown. Again, this bag is a steal. You can tell it is quality. You won’t regret your purchase in my opinion, I sure didn’t. Zippers are strong, heavy duty. Just a good bag.
customer_reviews.author: Let's hope it works

customer_reviews.title: After 18 months, the zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to other reviews I've seen, my bag has not lasted years, but just 18 months. I did enjoy it while it lasted, but the zipper has gone on it. The pull on one side has separated but even worse, the zipper itself is tearing (which may have contributed to the pull separating; see the photos). I can't recommend the bag although you may get lucky and get a tougher bag or not use it the way I did. For the record, I carry a 13" MacBook Pro, an iPad, a Kindle, an umbrella, and a the MacBook's power cord, plus papers and pens and stuff. I don't think that's overstuffing the bag by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Domenico Bettinelli

customer_reviews.title: Warped hardware on side to connect to shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review as I can't figure out how to message the seller privately regarding this briefcase bag that I purchased for work about two years ago. It is a nice looking bag and the leather feels of good quality. A few months after my purchase, the hardware on the sides of the bag that connect to the longer shoulder strap warped and are unusable, so it must be carried by the short handle on top. When I purchased the bag the site noted a 3 year warranty. Can you help me get the hardware replaced so that I can carry this as a shoulder bag as well?
customer_reviews.author: QueenOndine

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I only used this a few times. I had a business trip and flew with this. I like the design, as it allows you to pick the bag up by the handle without fastening the flap, which is good for traveling. I found the compartments to be well laid-out and useful. I would have liked the strap to be leather as well (it's just canvas and is really thick so it stands out). I had some people comment on how nice it was. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: L. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Leather is cheap and bag rips easily
customer_reviews.text: The leather on my bag had already chipped after three months. I'm extremely disappointed at the quality. GENUINE LEATHER IS NOT REAL LEATHER. Genuine leather is actually fake leather bonded together. Don't buy it, buy something made of fabric that'll last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Byron C

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag, but both strap clips broke
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had this bag for a year now and uses it to carry a small laptop on his daily commute. The strap broke on one side after three months, and on the other side after about nine months; in both cases, the clip connecting the strap to the bag broke free from the strap. It otherwise seems like a quality bag, and we'll try to replace the strap with another adjustable one, but the flaw in the strap is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Manufacture defect crops up after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I've used the bag for just over 2 months. One of the 2 snaps / clasps began to be increasingly difficult to close (where you hear the "click") over time. That metal clasp has 2 rivets or screws that go into the leather. One of the 2 rivets has broken away from the leather, so the clasp is pretty much useless. In checking the return policy I see I'm outside my 30 day return window. Well, that was about a 100 bucks wasted & a hard lesson learned to not buy a Samsonite again. Hope you learn from my lesson
customer_reviews.author: NbyNE

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag to use when I travel. I wanted a messenger style bag for the added security with the flap. This bag is very nice. The laptop compartment is padded and has a velcro tab. Pockets for business cards and pens on the outside and some extra inside pockets for a phone charger or ear buds or other small/medium sized things. You can certainly overfil this bag! The shoulder strap is thick so it doesn't bit into your shoulder and handle is padded so if you choose to carry it that way its comfortable too. Really nice, quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: CGaver

customer_reviews.title: Very nice leather briefcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made briefcase. The leather quality appears to be good. Lots of great storage space and interior pockets. The folder over message carrier type flap helps conceal and protect the contents. Watch loading it too much though, the bag itself has some weight to it. Maybe that is a product of the quality construction and material. Great looking bag. It was a keeper at first sight.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: 2 years daily use, no problems
customer_reviews.text: I've used this daily for a couple years now, and it has held up exceptionally well. It replaced a Reaction brand one that had hardware failures. Grant you, I often put heavy loads in my briefcases, but the Samsonite has held up with no problems. Hardware seems more robust and better quality. Nice arrangement of pockets and compartments make this versatile. The leather seems to be surprisingly good quality. It's been under lots of airplane seats, lots of car floors, wet parking lots, etc and still looks good. The sticking and general construction are good quality and hold up well. Overall, a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Nyberg

customer_reviews.title: Very Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent leather products have become hard to find and very expensive for a poor country boy like me. This was quite affordable and the leather quality is great! The hardware seems very sturdy. Haven't done any long trips yet but around town, it works great and looks awesome. I have seen bags for twice the price that didn't look as clean and nice. I recommend putting leather oil on all new leather goods. They will look better and wear much more slowly. Repeat yearly if used much.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A large company like Sansonite can't manage to replace a simple shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag 13 months ago for day to day use. i used it for my lap top, note book couple of pens etc... I pick it up one day and the strap buckle breaks. I then check the product for warrantee information and found that it is 3 years. I then decided contacted Samsonite about the the problem, and was informed that they could not send me a replacement strap because they do not have any in stock. A large company like Sansonite can't manage to replace a simple shoulder strap. Customer service is terrible , the product is terrible . I would not recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 2-Years of Use Only One Major Problem - Hardware Durability
customer_reviews.text: As others here have noted, the shoulder strap hardware is not as durable as it should be. The swivel connection between the bag and the shoulder strap broke on the two-year anniversary of my ownership and use. If not for this failure, I'd rate it a high 4, or maybe 5, for the very good functional design and overall value based on appearance, price, capacity, and non-hardware materials quality. Until the hardware broke, I was very pleased with this bag and 6- to 7-day-per-week use. I use it a lot, but there is hardware available that would last longer with such use. I'm still using it after doing a temporary fix (I've reattached the strap using a keychain ring).
customer_reviews.author: SMJ_717

customer_reviews.title: Corroded metal (Updated: Perfect!)
customer_reviews.text: Update: The replacement came today and it is flawless! A beautiful, thick, genuine leather that looks and feels like quality that will last for years. It's exactly what I hoped for and well worth the money. He's going to love it! ______ Just opened this today and one of the buckles was corroded. Immediately returned it because it's a Christmas gift. Will update this review when the replacement arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It's basically black color, not brown. Overall decent design.
customer_reviews.text: The website picture is very misleading. It's basically a VERY dark brown, almost black color. It in no way is the brown shown in the picture. Definitely thinking about returning. On plus side, it arrived with no other damage. Overall design is good, but very disappointed in color. Would rate higher if the bag matched the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of this bag - stylish and different
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bag - stylish and different. My only issue is I dont think it is as sturdy as it looks in the pictures, as I am already seeing signs of the seams departing . The sale price made it a good buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Crescendo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, nice look, overall functional. Cons: the clippers has to be inserted otherwise they will bang against the metal rings that holds them. I wish these are made with magnetic. The front compartment has few card holders that seems not very useful. I wish there could have more small zipper pockets in there. The back does not have a traveler’s band to hold on to luggage handles.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good durable bag that holds a lot but with a nice look
customer_reviews.text: Bag seems like good quality, and definitely holds more books than other messenger bags with this leather feel and look. Bought for someone going into med school and it's worked great. You can definitely carry a few books, laptop and other things. I wouldn't get this if you are looking for something slim, but that's the thing you have to think about if you actually want room to carry stuff! Works great and is resistant to scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: KBC

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably Durable!
customer_reviews.text: My college age son has been using the Samsonite Columbian Leather Messenger Bag to tote his belongings around campus and as a personal item when flying. The bag has been remarkably durable! He has been using it nearly daily for the past 3 years at least and it looks like it sil had many years of good use in its future.
customer_reviews.author: Sara H

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on my old knapsack broke last week, being 46 I decided it was time to "grow up" and get an adult bag to bring to/from work. Only been one day, but so far I am very happy with this bag. The color is perfect, I got the brown, not too light - a nice dark rich brown. Plenty of room for my laptop and even a second laptop if I wanted and/or my lunch and other items. Good price, adult, classy, professional, and great looking bag. Happy am I.
customer_reviews.author: T. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bag that arrived and was so dark that it took 15 minutes of arguing with my wife to convince her that the brown item I ordered wasn't black. She's still not convinced. That's how dark the "brown" color was. It was almost impossible to distinguish from black even in bright daylight. Nothing at all like the pictures. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: N4784A

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: love love love! It was difficult deciding on which messenger bag to purchase over the internet without seeing it in person. But, the reviews were positive, and so I went for it. When it arrived, it felt and smelled like genuine leather (that is, it did not stink or the smell was not overwhelming). It has many practical compartments and is easy to carry. The straps are easily rotatable and thus is not a burden. However, the caveat is I have only had this bag for about 3 months...therefore I can't really comment on it's quality. But, I do not regret this purchase! I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: CW Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a couple of months and I love this bag! I chose this one over the Kenneth Cole bag on Amazon with a similar style. The KC version was twice the price. I use it daily for work, carrying a MacBook Air, iPad, notepad, power cords and file folders. The bag is not overly bulky even with all those items. The bag colors a nice dark brown, not the burgundy looking color in the picture. I often place the strap across my chest. I am 6'2" and the strap length is fine for cross shoulder use. Do not see the clasps being an issue as others have stated. Just a great bag for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tlake

customer_reviews.title: best briefcase I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful briefcase. I have been using it for a few months now and it wears really well, it has several internal pockets and a section for me to put my work laptop in when I bring it home. It is really well made and the leather is outstanding. If it does wear out at some point I will be sure to buy another one exactly like it. I need to carry something with me every day to hold my notebooks and laptop and this really is perfect for that. I would absolutely suggest buying this as it is a reasonable price and as nice as any leather briefcase I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Myron TTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Great Design but Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 of these and every single one had some significant defect. Mismatched colors of leather, buckle tongue holes drilled off-center, padding cut crooked, scratched leather, stitching that doesn't line up where it meets the next piece, nylon liner separating from the leather on the buckle straps, and handle padding wrapped and stitched off-center. Very visible flaws for the most part, and very aggravating. In spite of all this, it is a DARN good looking case with great pocket organization, size and zippered pockets......just poor quality control... and I wanted to keep them despite the flaws, but could not. Returned. Will try another vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not A Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for when I'm traveling for work every week. The construction is very good quality and it's been with me every week since December and I haven't had a problem. My chief complaint is this bag does not have a trolley strap or anything to attach it to your carry on roller. That has been a pain point for me trying to move through security. I would suggest getting an Tumi Alpha Bravo if you're a heavy traveler. Otherwise this bag is perfect for an office commuter.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Shocked with build quality
customer_reviews.text: I always thought of Samsonite as having very good build quality. That's why I purchased one of these bags for myself earlier this year and another one a couple of weeks ago for a friend's birthday. But within a week of using the bag, my friend noted that the buckle holding the strap broke free. The shocking thing is that while mine has lasted all these months, his barely lasted a few weeks and I put much more wear and tear on my bag than he does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When looking for a laptop bag, I was having ...
customer_reviews.text: When looking for a laptop bag, I was having difficulty finding one that would fit a 15" laptop and still have room to carry accessories. This bag has plenty of storage for everything that you might need to take your computer to work or to travel with it. While traveling internationally with this bag as my primary carry-on, I had no issues with it breaking or becoming difficult to handle. It fits very well under the airplane seat in front of you, even when it's full. I have had this bag for several months now where I have used it every day and have yet to have any complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Failed in many fronts, in less than 3 days of lightest usage!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a huge disappointment the stitching is poorly made, The leather is torn in most places. and to my surprise the strap link broken by itself, yes byitself, I left it today after it 3rd day of light usage only carrying papers no laptops yet, and I found the hook broken... I cannot describe how angry and frustrated I am, this is a shameful quality not worthy of Samsonite name... or maybe Samsonite turned into a cheap brand!!! All I know is I have a broken product poorly executed and not functional in less than 3 days!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Abdalkarem Al Abawi

customer_reviews.title: More Like A Piece of Luggage Than A Briefcase or Bookbag
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a briefcase/bookbag type thing, and this is more like luggage. Thick, boxy, padded all over. It carries a laptop and accessories fine, but anything more (books, files, etc.) and it's pretty stuffed. I can't really use it for what I needed it for (taking to court), but at $100 or so, I'm guess I committed. I'll replace when I can find more of what I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Letter Size

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Leather Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I inherited a 1980s hard shell Samsonite. Its served me well for a briefcase that's almost 40 years old and is still in great shape. I made the decision to get a more modern briefcase and ordered this. It is very high quality with gorgeous Columbian cow hide leather, quality zippers, and just he right pockets for devices, tools, papers, and supplies. A worthy replacement for Dad's old briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Classy, great looking and spacious
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my husband. He uses this bag for both daily work and travel purposes. The bag has a very compact look to it but inside carries a lot of room. My husband is able to carry his 15.6" laptop and battery, tablet, travel kit (standard TSA approved shaving/grooming stuff) and 3 days worth of clothing at the same time. On top of all that, you can also fit in a couple of books/notepads if needed. And there are sufficient internal and external pockets to keep smaller items such as calculators, cards etc. The material is genuine leather and so far has held up well since usage (about 3 months).
customer_reviews.author: Angel Flower

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: After doing careful research I was interested in looking for a medium to large messenger bag for school. I did think it was slightly larger but it does fit all of my needs. I wasn't paying much attention to the dimensions that were listed and that is clearly my fault. I did have to send the first one back due to a large gash in the leather on the front but there was no problem getting a replacement through Amazon. The replacement is without blemish. Enough room to hold a laptop, folders, books, pencil cases, etc. Good quality! Need something that will last a long time that's why I chose this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: When I Finally Found this Bag, I Stopped Looking
customer_reviews.text: This briefcase was a gift for a student working on his masters in business and he was thrilled. As we hoped and he affirmed, it strikes the right note between going to classes and an internship. The authenticity of leather is confusing these days, but this case definitely looks and smells like the real thing. There is plenty of room for his Macbook Pro, plus notebooks and textbooks. The interior zipper ensure that the contents aren't visible when the flap is opened. The shoulder strap is removable. I looked long and hard for several days for briefcases on Amazon, and this Samsonite case was definitely the winner.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Tower

customer_reviews.title: You should love this bag, except for 1 flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I adore this bad. It's roomy, well made, and looks terrific. Unfortunately after only two years of use the swivels on the shoulder strap broke. They just wore out and the shoulder strap is useless. I originally rated this 5 stars, but I removed one because of the swivel design on the strap. It's kind of cheap and destined to defintiely fail. Hoping I can replace the strap. I'll update here if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Wade

customer_reviews.title: exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: Very well crafted and holds a lot of items. Currently I'm carrying: laptop--with chord--school manual 1in. note pad and binder, along with twenty smaller accessories. The leather is genuine and there's no pealing. I've walked through the rain and gotten it wet on multiple occasions and the color holds nicely. I've seen cheaper leather that's been dyed bleed and sometimes it stains your clothes, but this is definitely a good product. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: ShoePolish

customer_reviews.title: wonderful purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift, the quality was superb. I was very impressed with the value for the price. My boyfriend loved it, He is an attorney and was able to fit many belongings in the bag with room to spare. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Endless Summer Beauty Spa

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 years and 8 countries later....it's still great.
customer_reviews.text: Just stopping by to say I've had this briefcase just over 2 1/2 years. I use it every day. It's been to 8 different countries now, and 9 US states. It's really soft leather, but really durable, too. All the closures still work perfectly, no real signs of wear on the leather, no discoloration, no problems. They've got this right. Everything in life should be this nice and reliable. The huge failing is that they don't make a duffle/travel bag of the same material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather bag.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product in general and the finish of the leather are very nice and as expected from Samsonite. However there was water track stain on one side of the bag and white dusty spots on the other side. This is why I am giving three stars. Luckily it was manageable and were able to clean it up. I shouldn't need to clean up a new product!
customer_reviews.author: antar2000

customer_reviews.title: Who is Brenden? This bag isn’t new as described
customer_reviews.text: Sold as new bag but the greeting card found inside tells another story. I received my package today and unpacked my purchase and was surprised to find scuffs and a greeting card address to “Brenden” from Lauren. At first I thought, wow! Samsonite actually included a thank you note for my business. Wrong! The bag was sold as new but clearly it is not. I’ll keep it because I like it and it’s a quality item, but come on people. If you’re going to re-sell as new, make sure it’s clean and the contents taken out. I don’t know a Brenden or Lauren but she was nice enough to give Brenden the bag before me ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: melissa e.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding bag! An eye catcher that you will receive compliments for!
customer_reviews.text: This leather bag is just beautiful! I have already received several compliments on it. The price was a bargain too considering the quality. The only oddity of this otherwise stellar product is that the shoulder strap padding is leather on the outside but man-made material on the inside. Other reviewers have commented as well that because of the man-made material, the shoulder pad keeps wanting to slide off the shoulder since it is too smooth. The problem was easy solved for me by buying a pair of self-adhesive rubber anti-slip shoe sole pads for less than $2 here on Amazon. I put those on and the problem is gone! Now the bag really is 100% to my satisfaction!
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Great organization & good looking
customer_reviews.text: It’s bulkier than I wanted but the other features outweigh its size. Constructed of nice leather, with a great feel, it’s a bag worthy of the price. I enjoy carrying it and I really like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Don Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Misleading photos, not shiny or as brown in color. Also a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Does not look as advertised in the pictures. It is not a shiny leather and the color is much more muted and grey. It is also a bit heavy, but could probably work well as it seems pretty durable. I missed the return window, but we will not be using this product. Disappointed in the misleading photos and advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: NICE BAG...ESPECIALLY FOR THIS LOW COST!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case for the low cost. This low cost of this case belies the high quality. If you are looking for a messenger bag that has the look and feel of an expensive, bag, take a look at this. Plenty of room inside and you will not be embarrassed to go into a high power executive meeting carrying this bag. The only negative is that the leather is a bit stiffer than I would like, but I also know that this will loosen up with use, and perhaps with the application of leather conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Levy

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bag is wonderful but lacks two things. First the shoulder pad is slippery so it keeps sliding down my arm. Second it does not have a place to slip onto another wheeled bag. These are the only two negatives on an otherwise fantastic bag. The size is perfect for a daily user. Not enough as a sole carry on but perfect for daily use. The material is thick and soft. Color is an almost 3D brown. Very natural. The handle is soft and big making it a joy to use. Clips are solid and easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: D. Galletti

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad bag, just don’t expect it to last...
customer_reviews.text: Had the same issue as Weiming, the strap broke due to the hook being worn out from cutting into the D-ring. It did last me about four years, and on occasion I did load the bag up, but this seems like a design flaw that could be preventable, the leather strap on my D-ring also had severe wear...
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: As promised - high quality and professional
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, the cost of this leather case does not reflect its high quality, comfort and space. I use it daily for travel back and forth to office and globally as I travel for work. I find the space more than adequate, the zippered sections an added security feature and the open sleeve on the outside handy for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cardy

customer_reviews.title: decent quality for the bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Like many have mentioned I also received mine with a few "scratches", but by no means is it a heartbreaker for me. The bag looks good, has a beautiful matte finish, which I prefer, as opposed to the glossy picture online. The shoulder strap feels sturdy and the leather is of very decent quality. Cons Not the easiest for quick access but that's relative to the user. Few scratches but barely noticeable Pros elegant, good quality, lots of pockets, nice padding, solid zippers, good for the money 3 stars only because I may have to update after a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Ousmane

customer_reviews.title: I like the flap-over design
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit of a gamble for me. It appeared to be the size I was looking for, but I didn't expect much quality for this low price on a full leather messenger bag. Boy, was I wrong. This is a very well made leather bag that is suitable for use either with a business suit or jeans. It's exactly the right size to carry all of my daily work items including a 15.6" laptop and a tablet. I like the flap-over design, which to me adds to the quality look of the bag. Highly recommended and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I've been dragging this to work everyday for a couple years and it actually looks better. The slight wear in the leather actually gives it that great character. And no function or feature had been broken or damaged. Very comfortable. Would highly recommend buying for anyone who needs a reliable good looking briefcase
customer_reviews.author: ChallengerRT

customer_reviews.title: A great bag for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I don't give many five star reviews because I reserve those for products that exceed my expectations. This product did just that. I expected the leather to be cheaper looking and feel flimsy but the opposite is true. I have received multiple compliments and inquiries about where I purchased it. The layout is great with the right amount of storage pockets, pen and cell phone slots, etc. The buckles are sturdy and the strap is strong and secure while looking nice. I highly recommend this bag. I use it with a 17" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mast

customer_reviews.title: quality bag for the money, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son that recently graduated from college, mostly to carry his laptop but also to use for traveling for work or light trips. The quality of the bag exceeded my expectations and actually looks more expensive than the price. I believe this bag will last him a very long time and the style is timeless. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I am about 6 feet height. This bag is very suitable for me. The left and right rings are perfectly fit for some decorations and my Air Pods. I bought it 2 months ago. Now, it's already some wear and tear, but not influences the appearance. Great product of Samsonite!
customer_reviews.author: One

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Can hold many items with ease. May be a bit heavy for some. Especially when loaded. Strap included is only 36 inches so you may need to order the 60 inch on amazon for taller people such as myself. Overall, very satisfied with quality and value!
customer_reviews.author: ERIK B

customer_reviews.title: Well made, stylish bag. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who is a jazz musician and needed a bag large enough to carry sheet music and folders. This bag does the job and is so much more stylish than the more common nylon bags most people use.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying this briefcase
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nice! The leather has already started to soften up after a week's use and overall it has a really classy appearance. I can fit a laptop, meeting books, text books, and kindle effortlessly. People rave about the higher-priced brands like TUMI but I don't think it gets much better than this for the price.I will be sure to update the review if anything happens over the bag's lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: AJS4

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Had a nylon Victorinox bag that was bigger and took abuse for years. In fact, it's still OK, I purchased this as an upgrade. In less than one year the zipper broke, even though it's packed lightly, and not over-stuffed. The zipper can come open and allow smaller contents to fall out as it drops low on both sides. The computer doesn't fall out, but still I find it unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: mikeofeconomy

customer_reviews.title: The brown bag doesn't appear as brown in person as ...
customer_reviews.text: The brown bag doesn't appear as brown in person as it does in the picture. It is almost black in my opinion, with a faint brown hue if in direct sunlight. I decided to go ahead and keep this darker one as it matches my boots well. Keep this in mind when ordering. The camera actually makes it appear more brown than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Stark

customer_reviews.title: color is incorrect and have a scratch !
customer_reviews.text: 1.the color is completely different between the bag I received with the picture showed in amazon. It is somewhat red brown in the picture, but it is dark brown in fact. 2.what I can't bear is there is a scratch on the leather!
customer_reviews.author: henwii

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! (with one very minor fault)
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great! It looks extremely professional, and, despite the more than reasonable price, the construction very sturdy. I must give extra kudos for the many compartments that help you stay organized, especially while travelling between business meetings for which you must have multiple things with you. Why 4 stars instead of 5? The demerit is because of the buckles on the front. I appreciate how secure they are, but I often find that feature to be its main fault, not always easy to undo quickly, especially while on-the-fly! I wish they had use magnets or buttons instead, with faux-buckles to keep the professional appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kyland

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, Great look
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag but I use it sparingly because I walk a lot and will rather have a backpack. The leather is beautiful and it is really well made. Pros: Good sleek and elagant look Gives you a business appeal Looks expensive and classy A lot of compartment Cons: When I opened the box, I noticed the bag had a portion that looked like it has been cleaned and looks like a small peel. I didn't really bother about it much since it was the inside portion. Overall: It is a good buy and I will recommend it to you.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS BAG!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag daily for over a year, not only was it great looking upon arrival, it just keeps getter better with age. My wife gives makes jokes but I have everything in mine, ipad, umbrella, checkbook, pens, all the cords needed to plug anything in along with whatever else I might need.. Yes, it is a " Murse"' but I prefer man bag... I cannot see getting along without if. I wouldn't hesitate purchasing another at twice the price.. This is quality!
customer_reviews.author: R. Fulgham

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a few different bags to carry my laptop for work. This one is far the best I’ve used. Very sturdy and lots of pockets for extra storage. Very happy with it and it looks very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and can hold a decent amount
customer_reviews.text: This bag has done everything I could expect it to do. Within 48 hours of owning it, I had a co-worker say how they wanted to steal it. It's attractive, sturdy, and can hold a decent amount. I pack a laptop (ASUS, so you know it's bulky), the charge, iPhone charger, a few ledgers, pens/highlighters, books, and even my watch box and a few pocket squares when I am traveling. Fits under the seat in front of me, which matters a lot now that airlines charge $500 to check a bag.
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for work travel.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is sturdy and has held up well so far (I've had it for a few months and travel frequently). The compartments are spacious and hold everything I need with room to spare. The utility of the bag is also complemented well by its style. My one minor complaint is that the strap does not stay up on my shoulder well. The strap pad is a bit too slippery and has a tendency to slide off at some very inconvenient times. I would also like it to have a handle strap for securing it to the handle of my luggage as I pull it through the airport. Neither of these detract too much from an overall great design.
customer_reviews.author: The KGB

customer_reviews.title: Buckle issues
customer_reviews.text: The clips from the buckles have come out and I cant find a replacement. I have had the briefcase for 8 months and everything is top notice except for that. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase/bag for work
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality leather. Bag is well made and very functional; the design and build quality is excellent. I carry a laptop, files, calculator, etc, Pockets for everything. Laptop sits in it's own padded pocket and is well protected from accidental drops. I've dropped mine off a chair twice. Extremely happy. We bought one for my son. I liked it so much I asked for one for Father's Day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this, I bought it for him as a birthday gift. However, I did not like the look of the leather, I thought it looked cheap. It was also slightly larger than I expected it to be, almost clunky looking. I guess it depends what you're looking for. I asked my husband if he wanted me to return and he said no, he liked it. My husband is not as picky as me I guess. I suppose in the future, I would go looking in the stores so I could see the material up close. Buying online sure can be a crapshoot!
customer_reviews.author: helena joyce

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and I’ve used it for a couple months. Nice leather and very nice looking. A magnetic latch would have been much more convenient, and at times I wish it held a little bit more, but overall I love it. Great for grad school and occasional work use
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Seems very stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: This bag will be used every single day. So far I am pleased with the purchase. I like how sturdy it feels. The pockets are well places and functional. I like that the strap comes off if I wear it through or need something a little more formal. The closures seem well made. I will be working somewhere were ice, rain, and snow are all highly likely so I bought this with the finish in mind hoping that it would withstand the weather. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Callie

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I was unsure about buying this product, the material was actually very nice and a lot of room inside. I bought this for a friend who is a music teacher and it fits all of the music material plus tools for the instruments etc.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: A very good quality leather case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and soft leather product. The color is a natural brown leather color, not as shown in the image. I'm still getting used to carry my laptop using the shoulder strap which feels quite uncomfortable since the strap keeps slipping off my shoulder. I used to carry a backpack which distributes the weight equally so you don't feel the weight that much, but now I'm want to look more professional and stylish by carrying this quality leather case. Hope the style will trump the uncomfortable weight issue (and I don't want to look like a messenger if I wear the strap across the other shoulder).
customer_reviews.author: Abapster

customer_reviews.title: Pockets on the inside are just as described. Nice place for my phones and chargers.
customer_reviews.text: I have the used one with saved me about $100. This case is the perfect size for traveling with my 13.5” dell. The leather appears to be durable. It did not come with a strap so I bought one for $12. Still a great deal on a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kiper

customer_reviews.title: Roomier than you'd think. I'm buying it again.
customer_reviews.text: Roomier than you would think. Comfortably fit my laptop and charger as well as documents and a bulky lunch without it feeling like it was straining the sturdy feeling restrains/zippers.Used for nearly a year. Only buying again because my first was stolen :(
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Usefulness
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this briefcase and look forward to many years of use. It's also easy to carry a variety of items.
customer_reviews.author: TheWrestlingMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: One of the best brief cases I've owned. Well made & attractive. Pockets are the right size. Adequate protection for a tablet or small notebook computer. Good organization pockets. Opens wide enough to see in. Well balanced so it doesn't fall over easily. Handle is sturdy and comfortable. My only dislike is the shoulder strap pad; it does not hold well on my shoulder & allows the strap to slides off. A nuisance when you are carrying other stuff. I have found that I must cross chest the strap, which is a nuisance of it's own.
customer_reviews.author: GTP1601

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year and a half ago, and it was great while it lasted. Used it every day, commuting into NYC and lots of travel, but it couldn't handle that much use. Little things started to fall apart. One of the clasps was the first to go. The pin holding the button would start sliding out of place, making it hard to open. Then the fabric around the velco closure for the laptop section started to rip. Finally, the zipper for one of the main compartments pulled away from the fabric. At around $100 not an expensive bag, but don't count on it lasting more than 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was a nice carry bag
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a nice carry bag, but my screw inserts on one side of buckle already backed out and are lost. Now I only have one side that buckles. My return window was 2 weeks ago from a month after purchase. Cannot find inserts anywhere. I should not have to go through this hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Buhrow

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The bag is nice enough but the dimensions listed on the product page are not correct. It is 4 inches wide not 5.5 like stated. My wife is a teacher and she needs a big bag. I purposely bought this bag because of the stated dimensions.. If you feel size does not matter then this is a great bag. But If you're like my wife and need more than 5 inches, look elsewhere. This bag will leave you unsatisfied. The only other complaint I have is the color. It looks almost purple in the pictures but it is just plain brown in real life.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lonabaugh

customer_reviews.title: I really like the feel
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel, look, and function of this bag. My only gripe, and I assure you it is small, is that the way the flap attaches to the bag when you close it is annoying. It is secure, however there is no quick opening and closing of the bag. If you leave the bag with the flap just hanging loosely without clasping it, then it makes noise with every step. The size is perfect as it fits all kinds of stuff and the pockets are well designed without there being so many things get lost. I spent a long time looking and researching and I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my first legal job. I needed to carry my laptop computer, my wallet, and paperwork to and from my car to the office. Within the first two months of use, the inside fabric below the zipper began to tear. Worse yet, the metal "male" portion of the front buckle completely fell off. Now every time I bring the bag to work the front flap clacks back and forth. It's a spacious bag but the quality of the materials is suspect at best. For the price I would not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing deal!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many computer bags at department stores, electronics stores, and office stores. My final choice came down to this bag and to Kenneth Cole Reaction Luggage Show Business. I first tried the Kenneth Cole bag, but had to return it because the flap-over latches were just not operating smoothly enough. Then this bag went on sale ($73), and I bought it. Great quality, fantastic price, very functional, great attention to detail. The leather is very soft and looks like it will age very gracefully. Time will tell if the bag will be as durable as it looks. But for now I am incredibly happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PhysicsProf

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: For under $100, this bag could easily pass for something 2x/3x the cost, if you never noticed the label. Nice leather, nice smell and feel and look. Not glossy or fake looking at all. Buckles actually have snap fittings, the buckle on top is just for show like an old style bag, functions more like a modern latch. Lots of room inside, fits my 1in document holder, leather writing portfolio, calendar, laptop, Samsung tablet, portable keyboard, plus pens calculator etc. easily. Looks like sturdy construction also, should hold up well. Highly recommend for the money...
customer_reviews.author: Dorliska69

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later no obvious signs of wear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag in August of 2018. 6 months later it is still like new. I use it for both work and school. I just did my semi-annual inspection/conditioning and there is no obvious wear on any of the metal parts or the leather. I don't keep any heavy text books in it. I keep mostly office supplies and a couple of days a week I have a 5.3 lb laptop with the office supplies. I absolutely love this bag. Hopefully it continues being as awesome as it has been so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Caplinger

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I can put my MacBook Pro, super drive, iPod and iPhone in it easily and still have room for misc. items. It is very well made to say the least. Very nice looking leather. It is a very sharp, easy to carry bag. I should add the zippers are heavy duty but only time will tell. You do have a zipper for the laptop section and another where all else is kept. This works much better than just having on on the whole case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great versatile bag for me. I've had it for over 6 years and it's still holding up like new despite being worn during bike rides to work, hectic commutes on the subway, and the normal abuse a work bag is exposed to. I see this bag lasting until I retire in 35 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Hardware broke in months; seller did not return contact
customer_reviews.text: First the side metal fastener broke, but I "fixed" it by snapping the clip to the loop. Then the slide fastener under the buckle broke and came loose from the leather. I contacted the seller but RECEIVED NO RESPONSE. Shoddy product for such a reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Elspeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality meets Style
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it, not to mention he gets numerous compliments on it. I am remiss in writing my reviews so he has been using for about six months and it shows no signs of wear. It is very ample on the inside as he carries a laptop, surface pro, accessories and piles of papers in it at all times. This is a quality product and well worth the price. I would buy again for someone needing a stylish, well-made and roomy briefcase.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The color in the picture and actual product differ significantly
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I will not say anything about the product quality, Hopefully it will be good ‘cse it’s samsonite. BUT THE PRODUCT COLOR SIGNIFICANTLY DIFFERS FROM THE COLOR SHOWN IN THE PIC. This is unexpected from a major brand!!!☹️☹️☹️
customer_reviews.author: Jakaria

customer_reviews.title: Stopped using it after several months
customer_reviews.text: Unloaded, this bag is really quite heavy. The clasps aren't terribly secure, and I've seen them pop open. Also, the leather straps curl upward towards the buckle. They don't lay flat like in the product photo. The straps weren't even flat when it was brand new. After a few months of using this bag, I went back to my. Still looking for a better bag that looks good with professional attire.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: well-made, sturdy, good looking
customer_reviews.text: After using it for less than a week, I like it. The bag seems very sturdy and it looks good. It holds my beefy Dell Precision m4700 snugly (a laptop with 15" screen measuring in at a sizable 1.4" by 14.8" by 10.1"). The bag should not be expected to accommodate a larger machine. Some reviewers complained that their bag came without a shoulder strap, but mine included the canvas strap shown in the picture. The clips for attaching the strap to the bag are metal and seem plenty sturdy. Zipper pulls are also metal and large enough be comfortable in the hand. Overall, the bag was a good buy at $86.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Braze

customer_reviews.title: Great professional looking bag, reasonable price and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, high quality leather bag. I am in Corporate Banking and I like the look of this bag for client meetings, as well as, its durability for commuting (airplane / train, etc.). I have read some reviews that state that this bag is on the small side, however it's perfect for what I use it for - computer, files, tablet, pens, calculator etc. If you plan on storing the aforementioned plus gym clothes, lunch, etc you should get a backpack since this will not cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: As a consultant I'm always on the look out for a professional type bag to carry. I had been carrying an Indiana Jones type satchel for years, and started to feel like it lacked a little in the professional department when I found this one. Great form, everything fits, you can carry with the handle or the strap. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for those who don't like to carry a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and have found it to be durable and stylish. Plenty of room for my laptop, folders, plugs, first aid kit, office supplies, etc. Excellent choice for those who don't like to carry a briefcase around but who don't want a full-on backpack either. I had a nice looking Samsonite backpack prior to this but it started fraying and breaking within a year of purchase and heavy use. This has not shown any signs that it is going to go that route.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truth in Advertising.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this briefcase for a month now and I'm still satisfied. I think it delivers what was promised by the sales literature. Well designed and functional. It gives the appearance of a much more expensive bag. Durability is the X factor and probably where the $300+ briefcases will kick it's butt. 03/17. Closing in on a year's ownership and durability not an issue. Great briefcase that looks like it'll last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Conner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price, especially on sale. It is a much darker brown than it looks in the pics, not red or bronze looking at all. Super soft but rugged leather. Tons of padding,maybe a little too much, and lots of room for its size. I would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my partner because he needed a sturdy bag for his work stuff
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my partner because he needed a sturdy bag for his work stuff, with plenty of pockets. He really likes it and it holds everything he needs it to. The only thing he wishes it had were little support studs/feet on the bottom so that it's protected from the ground and the bottom doesn't wear out too quickly. But it's a great bag and has lasted a long time. I tend to lean towards Samsonite because I am also a Sam ;)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha P.

customer_reviews.title: Professional Bag that delivers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to replace my work back pack and laptop bag almost a year ago. I am please to say it slows very little signs of wear and team has performed as expected. I wanted a product that had "class" but functional as it would be used daily for my job and travel. Over the last 10 months this bag has fit the bill nicely. a few key features; soft leather, open pocket in the bag for easy storage ; double zipper to access laptop, tablet or accessories. What I really like is the soft durable leather, it is not bulky and I can access my gear with ease.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: It was beautiful. The leather was in great condition and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this off Amazon for a Christmas gift. The recipient had a very worn briefcase that was too small for their use. It came promptly and it was well packaged. It was beautiful. The leather was in great condition and the stitching was even. It was bigger than I expected, large enough to accommodate a laptop as well as all of your files and papers. I would recommend this if you need a briefcase for anyone who needs them.
customer_reviews.author: ELL
